AiWave is an AI-powered messaging platform that understands and responds to your natural language queries. Ask anything you'd typically ask a human assistant—get weather updates, news, restaurant recommendations, and more!

AiWave, an AI-driven messaging platform, adeptly communicates with users using natural language understanding. It delivers helpful responses to your inquiries and requests.

Yes, We will get update the AiWave. And you can get it any time. Next time we will comes with more feature. You can be get update for unlimited times. Our dedicated team works for update.

After purchasing the product need you any support you can be share with us with sending mail to rainbowit10@gmail.com.

Feel free to toss any questions at AiWave, just like you would with a human helper—whether it's about the weather, the latest news, restaurant suggestions, or anything else you fancy!

Yes, AiWave is designed to support multiple languages, offering a versatile and inclusive communication experience for users worldwide.

Get Started with Scan The Doc

Experience Invoice Automation with AI

Automates Invoice processing by fetching files from WhatsApp and Gmail,
using OCR technology to extract data dynamically.
Then stores and displays the structured data in the Dashboard,
eliminating manual effort and streamlining workflows.
